channel.title: Help with error
channel.description:
client.java:14961: code too large public void parseIncomingPackets(){ ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error
i know how to fix most thing but not that ne1 know how?

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @whitenite whitenite
item.description:
@whitenite wrote:

You need make “parseIncomingPackets2”

Purpose: To fix the code to large error

Difficulty: 2-10

Assumed Knowledge: Should know how to search and fix errors.

Server Base: Br4scape that is an edited Cheezscape 80

Classes Modified: Client.Java

Procedure
Step 1: Search for

public void parseIncomingPackets()

and above it add these

[code]public void parseIncomingPackets2()
{
int i;
int junk;
int junk2;
int junk3;

	switch (packetType)
            {[/code][b]Step 2: [/b] Go up your client and search for 

parseIncomingPackets();

Step 3: Above it add

parseIncomingPackets2();

Step 4: Continue until there arent anymore left (i had 3 on my client)

Step 5: Now its time to add something well… heres an example.
lets add our old friend the case 155: first click npc.
so it should look like

[code]public void parseIncomingPackets2()
{
int i;
int junk;
int junk2;
int junk3;

	switch (packetType)
            {
     case 155: //first Click npc
			int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
			int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
			faceNPC(NPCSlot);
			boolean FishingGo = false;
			boolean PutNPCCoords = false;[/code]

Step 6: Now to add something, heres an example:

[code]public void parseIncomingPackets2()
{
int i;
int junk;
int junk2;
int junk3;

	switch (packetType)
            {
     case 155: //first Click npc
			int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
			int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
			faceNPC(NPCSlot);
			boolean FishingGo = false;
			boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

if (NPCID == 339) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 33;
}
}
}[/code]Than should make chancy open a shop when u talk.In my case this shop is the 33th one.Watch out for the

}beacuse its a bit tricky and could make u have tons of errors.

Step 7: Your done!

Credits: I don’t remember

Note: I haven’t used this code.

Read full topic
